ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah Unrest is great loot and exp. Ringmail and small bronze drops there, bronze and FS weapons are commons, and the place is pretty easy to learn. moreover
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah Unrest is great loot and exp. Ringmail and small bronze drops there,
bronze and FS weapons are commons, and the place is pretty easy to learn.
moreover if you've never been there, you have to go, this place is awesome,
very clear and yet so dark.

Got to see real cool stuff there too.

Thormael

>From: Kailyn TBD <kailynofpovar@...>
>
>Unrest I think. I recall pulling about 5-10 plat a run from there and you
>get to see some really high level charicters there.
>
>>
>>From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>>
>>I am currently in HH collecting extra ringmail to sell in Halas so I can
>>have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so boring.
>>I
>>have nevered seen that named gnoll fellow even though I spend most of my
>>time hunting gnolls. At any rate, it there a better place for a level 17
>>Warrior to get herself a magic weapon then HH (or saving up plat for a
>>combine sword).
